summary: Adds a new, non skull breaking mesh for Argonians wearing the Masque of Clavicus Vile
descriptionHtml:
[u]Summary[/u]

This mod adds a new closed face mesh to the Masque of Clavicus Vile so Argonians can wear it without their skull breaking in several places. Normally I'm against armor that through some sort of race or gender detecting quantum field can change its appearance, but considering the Masque is a daedric artifiact, if anything has an excuse to morph when worn by different wielders, this is a pretty good one.

[u]Incompatibilities[/u]

This mod will overwrite or be overwritten by mods changing the stats of the Masque. You'll need to patch it in TES5Edit if you want them to work together.

Retextures affecting the human Masque will not effect the Argonian Masque as they use different textures, sorry about that. Feel free to make your own retextures.

[u]Future Plans[/u]

I might make Khajiit and Orc versions in the future, also maybe male and female versions so the neck doesn't look so ridiculous on female characters. I don't know.
author: Lightningo
